info.headline: Tropical Storm Warning issued September 11 at 2:59AM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
info.description:
...TROPICAL DEPRESSION BEBINCA (14W) PASSING OVER SOUTHERN GUAM...
.NEW INFORMATION... None.
.AREAS AFFECTED... This local statement provides important information and recommended actions for people in Guam and the Northern Marianas.
.Watches/Warnings... A Tropical storm warning continues for Guam, Rota, Tinian, and Saipan.
A Flood Watch is in effect for all of Guam and the Northern Marianas. Please listen closely for any Flood Warnings that might be in effect for your area.
Please check the latest public and marine forecasts for detailed information about additional hazards.
.STORM INFORMATION... At 1 AM ChST...the center of Tropical Depression Bebinca (14W) was located by PGUA radar near latitude 13.1N...longitude 144.9E. This was about 25 miles south-southeast of Guam's radar. Storm motion was WNW, 285 degrees, at 11 mph. Storm intensity was 35 mph.
.SITUATION OVERVIEW... TD Bebinca (14W) will slowly intensify through Wednesday, possibly becoming a tropical storm as it passes west of Guam later this morning. Showers and gusty winds will continue through today and possibly tonight as the monsoon pattern sets up east of TD Bebinca. Bebinca is currently nearing its closest approach to Guam and is passing over southern Guam now.
.PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
info.instruction: Preparations should be complete to protect life and property from low-end tropical storm conditions as TD Bebinca is passes over southern Guam now. Ongoing gusty winds and heavy rains can cause outside activities to become dangerous. Remain inside a sturdy structure as tropical depression to low-end tropical storm winds are ongoing.

parameter.value: Tropical Storm Warning remains in effect
